FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: Most clocks measure time, but a few measure everything.
Molti orologi misurano il tempo, ma solo pochi sono in grado di misurare ogni cosa.
Die meisten Uhren messen die Zeit, manche jedoch messen alles.
La plupart des horloges mesurent le temps, mais quelques-unes mesurent tout.
La mayoría de relojes miden el tiempo, pero unos pocos lo miden todo.
ほとんどの時計は時を刻むが、ごく少数、すべてを測る時計もある。
대부분의 시계는 시간만을 잴 수 있지만, 모든 것을 재는 시계도 존재한다.
Большинство часов измеряет время. Лишь немногие измеряют все.
A maioria dos relógios mede o tempo, mas alguns poucos medem tudo.

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Untap target artifact.
TAPpa due artefatti STAPpati che controlli: STAPpa un artefatto bersaglio.
Tappe zwei ungetappte Artefakte, die du kontrollierst: Enttappe ein Artefakt deiner Wahl.
Engagez deux artefacts dégagés que vous contrôlez : Dégagez l’artefact ciblé.
Girar dos artefactos enderezados que controlas: Endereza el artefacto objetivo.
あなたがコントロールするアンタップ状態のアーティファクトを２つタップする：アーティファクト１つを対象とし、それをアンタップする。
당신이 조종하는 언탭된 마법물체 두 개를 탭한다: 마법물체 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 마법물체를 탭한다.
Поверните два неповернутых артефакта под вашим контролем: разверните целевой артефакт.
Vire dois artefatos desvirados que você controle: Desvire o artefato alvo.

COST.TARGET_DETERMINATION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_CREATURE_UNTAPPED ) filter:NotTargetted() local total = (filter:Count()) if total > 1 then return 1 else return 0 end
COST.PLAY_TIME_ACTION: local player = EffectController() if player ~= nil then local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetPlayer( player ) filter:NotTargetted() player:SetTargetCount( 2 ) for i=0,1 do player:SetTargetPrompt( i, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_ARTIFACT_TO_TAP" ) end player:ChooseTargets( NO_VALIDATION, EffectDC():Make_Targets(0) ) end
COST.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local player = EffectController() if player ~= nil then for i=0,1 do local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(i) if target_card ~= nil then target_card:Tap() end end end

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:Untap() end
